text: Rosemary Radford Ruether (November 2, 1936 â€“ May 21, 2022) was an American feminist scholar and Catholic theologian. She worked in the field of feminist theology. Ruether was a board member for the pro-choice group Catholics for Choice.Hunt, Mary E. "The Life of 'Scholar Activist' Rosemary Radford Ruether." National Catholic Reporter, October 15, 2014. Accessed January 4, 2016. Ruether died on May 21, 2022 at her daughter's home in Pomona, California from a long-illness, aged 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Academics from Washington, D.C. title: Rosemary Radford Ruether
